feed.title: KrakenD Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for KrakenD: v2.9.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Bump github.com/go-jose/go-jose/v4 from 4.0.4 to 4.0.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/974
  • Bump github.com/go-jose/go-jose/v3 from 3.0.3 to 3.0.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/975

Full Changelog: https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/compare/v2.9.1...v2.9.2

entry.title: New release for KrakenD: v2.9.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • upgrade old ubuntu versions and use the same in all workflow steps by @kpacha in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/969
  • bump v2.9.3 by @kpacha in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/979

Full Changelog: https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/compare/v2.9.2...v2.9.3

entry.title: New release for KrakenD: v2.9.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add github action to analyze dependencies from pull requests to avoidâ€¦ by @taik0 in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/980
  • Bump golang.org/x/net from 0.33.0 to 0.36.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/983
  • Bump github.com/golang-jwt/jwt/v5 from 5.2.1 to 5.2.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/987
  • go version upgraded to 1.24.2 by @kpacha in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/991
  • Change docker image to point to the official one by @alombarte in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/990
  • version v2.9.4 bumped by @kpacha in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/992

Full Changelog: https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/compare/v2.9.3...v2.9.4

entry.title: New release for KrakenD: v2.10.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • OTEL reporting period per exporter by @dhontecillas in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/993
  • Bump github.com/nats-io/nats-server/v2 from 2.10.12 to 2.10.27 by @dependabot in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/995
  • Bump golang.org/x/net from 0.36.0 to 0.38.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/998
  • add deployment env at service level definition by @dhontecillas in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/1002
  • Improve status code error message by @dhontecillas in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/1000
  • Dev 2.10 by @taik0 in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/989

Full Changelog: https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/compare/v2.9.4...v2.10.0

entry.title: New release for KrakenD: v2.10.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Integration test check server started up by @dhontecillas in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/1007
  • update to cors 1.11.1 bug fix for allowed headers by @dhontecillas in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/1005
  • Dev 2.10.1 by @kpacha in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/1009

Full Changelog: https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/compare/v2.10.0...v2.10.1
